Amazon might be best known for its Prime Day shopping sprees, but the retailer also has plenty of big bargains for [Cyber Monday](https://www.engadget.com/cyber-monday/), including on its own-brand items. Right now, you can pick up the [Amazon Smart Plug](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B089DR29T6&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=0d877f21-bba1-41e4-b834-75e97987801f&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=Amazon+Smart+Plug&custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL0FtYXpvbi1zbWFydC1wbHVnLXdvcmtzLXdpdGgtQWxleGEvZHAvQjA4OURSMjlUNi8_&signature=AQAAAVOChtnRrwoyelY5ctnzXt_fHWQ5o1tadezjw1ZurAjB&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FAmazon-smart-plug-works-with-Alexa%2Fdp%2FB089DR29T6%2F) for $13, which is the lowest price we've seen for this piece of home tech. The Smart Plug usually costs $25, so you're getting nearly half off if you buy during this sale.

The Amazon product is one of our selections for the [best smart plugs](https://www.engadget.com/home/smart-home/best-smart-plug-131542429.html) on the market. It's an excellent addition for homes that rely on a lot of Alexa-enabled devices. The smart plug can be easily set up in the Alexa app and is, appropriately, a plug-and-play part of your home's gadgetry.

Once connected, you'll be able to use any device with Alexa to control whatever it's plugged into. For instance, you can group multiple plugs together as lights and then just say "Alexa, turn all the lights off" and it'll do just that. They are compatible with just about any household device with a physical on/off switch, including lamps and coffee makers.

While these are the perfect smart plugs for Alexa households, they are only for Alexa households. The plugs don't integrate with any other digital assistant. They are still the best choice for those tied into the ecosystem. Other smart plugs on sale for Cyber Monday include the [Kasa Mini smart plugs](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B091FXLMS8&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=0d877f21-bba1-41e4-b834-75e97987801f&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=Kasa+Mini+smart+plugs&&signature=AQAAAQw9YcoBXDgAPgTsiLbQDMMDbG_qempGwb06tWOtvNar&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FKasa-Smart-Required-Certified-EP10P4%2Fdp%2FB091FXLMS8); you can get a four-pack for $24.
